title: On Pixel 5, Google assistant sends a text message without confirming the text first. how to fix it?
content: On Pixel 5, Google assistant sends a text message without confirming the text first. After a pause about 10 sec., GA starts to send a message. I can cancel the message if I fast enough to say 'HeyGoogle cancel message' before it's sent. However there is no step "4.Say "Send" after Google confirms messages". How to fix it and have this message confirmation enabled?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
